definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中国医疗系统的弊病绝不仅仅局限于美容整形外科。

sentences.english: Rows of winter wheat wind their way to the Colorado horizon.
sentences.chinese: 美国科罗拉多州，成行成排的冬小麦绵亘不绝。

sentences.english: The publisher of the book went further though.
sentences.chinese: 然而，此书的发行人做得更绝。

sentences.english: SHAKIR:Nay! if he desist not, We would certainly smite his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 绝不然，如果他不停止，我一定要抓住他的额发。

sentences.english: He is second to none in physics.
sentences.chinese: 他在物理学方面绝不亚于任何人。

sentences.english: Going from two to three, that's an adiabatic expansion, so q is equal to zero in that step.
sentences.chinese: 从第二点到第三点，是绝热膨胀，因此q等于零。

sentences.english: When she woke up, she told me my fats made the best pillow ever.
sentences.chinese: 她睡醒以后说，我的肚腩当枕头真是绝了。

sentences.english: A bridge on the Atlantic Road in Norway.
sentences.chinese: 绝路桥坐落于挪威的大西洋之路。

sentences.english: Above all, there is much more to his success than stock-picking alone.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，他的成功绝不仅仅限于选股。

sentences.english: In between, there is a trade thoroughfare, camels and incessant.
sentences.chinese: 在两地之间，有一条通商大道，骆驼队来往不绝。

sentences.english: Beautiful composition, excellent scenery, amazing play of colors.
sentences.chinese: 优雅的姿势，绝美的风景，迷人的色彩组合。

sentences.english: But he makes clear price gouging will not be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 但他清楚地表示，哄抬油价的行为是绝不能容忍的。

sentences.english: A Blue Box is not just a pushke into which coins are put.
sentences.chinese: 一个募捐箱绝不仅仅是一个用来投放硬币的箱子。

sentences.english: But I don't believe he ever laid a finger on them.
sentences.chinese: 但我相信杰克逊绝没有碰过他们。

sentences.english: If you owe more money than ever was created you can never pay it back.
sentences.chinese: 如果你欠的钱比创造的钱更多，你就绝没可能还清。

sentences.english: My window frames a thrilling snowy landscape.
sentences.chinese: 我的窗户框住了一幅绝美的雪景。

definition: different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
reaching the sky/for days on end/incessantly
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
since the dawn of time/from the year dot
